title: Wyndham Hotels & Resorts tackled technical debt, cloud, hybrid cloud in a hurry [Cloud TV]
text: By registering you become a member of the CBS Interactive family of sites and you have read and agree to the Terms of Use Privacy Policy and Video Services Policy . description: Wyndham has more than 9,000 hotels globally and had to come up with a best-of-breed cloud stack while sorting out its hybrid cloud approach. CIO Scott Strickland walks us through the strategy and how Wyndham has selected and managed multiple cloud vendors.
